articles.content: You can feel the screams brewing before you hear them. With her smart, self-deprecating take on sadness, Phoebe Bridgers attracts audiences who likely know a thing or two about pent-up emotion. As fa… [+2420 chars]

articles.title: Princess Diana's brother launches scathing attack on BBC: 'Serious questions remain' - Express
articles.description: PRINCESS DIANA'S brother has launched a scathing attack on the BBC and demanded detectives investigate what chiefs knew of the broadcaster's 1995 Panorama interview with Prince William and Prince Harry's mother.
